price: (Abakozi ba Yusufu) baravuga bati “Ubwo se igihano cye (uwibye) kiraba ikihe, nibiba bigaragaye ko muri ababeshyi?”
arabic: قَالُواْ فَمَا جَزَٰٓؤُهُۥٓ إِن كُنتُمۡ كَٰذِبِينَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: qālū famā jazāuhu in kuntum kādhibīna
